title: Dictionaries and lists
desc: Three tasks for homework. Dictionary storing, manipulating, turning into lists or pairs and other.
code: Write a program that's going to take n as input, n different strings and a letter
Count the amount of times the letter repeats in each string and create a dictionary
in which the key is going to be the number of repeats and value a list of strings
Turn dictionary into list, sort and print.
Write a program that's going to take two strings as input.
Then find letters that both strings contain and create dictionary
whose keys are going to be the common letters and value the amount of
letters that repeat in each string.
Turn dictionary into list of tuples, sort and print.

Let user input natural number n and then n amount of names.
For each input name, there's going to be prices of 3 items they bought last.
For each person calculate the amount they spent and create a list of tuples
consisting of names and amount spent.
Then find the highest amount and write a sorted list that containes names of
one or more people that spent that much.
Za svaku osobu izračunajte koliko je ukupno potrošila na ta tri kupljena
proizvoda i napravite listu uređenih parova sastavljenih od imena osobe i
ukupnog potrošenog iznosa. Listu sortirajte i ispišite.
people = [(names[i], prices[i]) for i in range(n)]
maxPrice = max([l[::-1] for l in people])[0]
print([n for (n,p) in people if p == maxPrice])
